meanings.definition: Lacking a nap or pile, as in a fabric.
meanings.sent1: The napless blanket felt smooth against my skin.
meanings.sent2: The napless shirt was easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a napless towel, now it's not as cozy.
meanings.sent4: The napless carpet resembled a flat surface more than a fluffy one.
meanings.sent5: The napless material looked sleek but lacked the softness I expected.

meanings.definition: Without a nap, as in a carpet.
meanings.sent1: The napless carpet was easier to vacuum.
meanings.sent2: Walking on the napless carpet felt different than on a fluffy one.
meanings.sent3: The napless carpet made me feel like I was walking on a hard floor.
meanings.sent4: The napless carpet seemed more like a painted surface than a cozy rug.
meanings.sent5: The napless carpet showed footprints more clearly than a plush one.

meanings.definition: Lacking a nap, as in a surface.
meanings.sent1: The napless table felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The napless countertop was easier to clean than a textured one.
meanings.sent3: The napless surface made it hard to keep things from sliding off.
meanings.sent4: The napless wall looked plain compared to the textured one.
meanings.sent5: The napless floor was slippery when wet, unlike the carpeted one.
